Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to augment funds available for refugee expenses with funds paid by the refugees themselves.

summary.text: Refugee Repayment Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to require refugees to repay one-half of the average annual Federal refugee cost. Exempts disabled or elderly refugees from such requirement. Prohibits an alien from being deported or denied naturalization for failure to make such repayment. Grants "special immigrant" status to certain refugees who have made such payments to the Treasury.
